meta-review.comment: Tin Hearts is a charming puzzler that balances heartwarming narrative with engaging gameplay. The game's adorable toy soldiers and challenging puzzles offer a delightful experience for players. While some critics argue about the emphasis on story, the beautiful visuals, relaxing music, and well-crafted levels make it a worthy successor to Lemmings. Despite a few technical issues, Tin Hearts' thoughtful storytelling and puzzle mechanics create an endearing journey for players. March into the world of Tin Hearts and let your heart be warmed!
